channel.title: Looking for a team (Modelers, music/sound artists, texture artists & QA testers)
channel.description:
[center]Hello, my name is abtekk, or Lewis and I'm here looking for a team of volunteers to help create an MMORPG. I have come up with a basic idea for a game and I'm hoping for it to be somewhere between the likes of Runescape and World of Warcraft (styled).
The game engine that will be used is RealmCrafter (read info at http://goo.gl/Kmlni) which utilizes the RPG programming language Blitz and Blitz3D. RealmCr'after is a very powerful game creation kit that is widely used and has been successfully used to create commercial games.
To create this game I am in need of 3D modelers, Music/SFX artists, texture artists and QA testers to make this game successful, I have the RC license and some basic modeling skills, but I need your help to make this successful.
Here are some pictures of the power of RealmCrafter (Note: These are NOT mine):
[img]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/9367/editorweb.jpg[/img] [img]http://damianov.files.wordpress.com/2007/09/capture_00001.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.multiverse.net/images/fw2crop.jpg[/img] [img]http://img694.imageshack.us/img694/7700/78682449.jpg[/img]
If you're interested in becoming a team or want to know more about the project, please reply below. (People inquiring about positions, please follow the following format:) [code] Name (Real OR alias): Age (Optional): Position applying for: Links to previous work: A sentence or 2 about yourself: [/code]
Thank you for reading.[/center]

item.title: Looking for a team (Modelers, music/sound artists, texture artists & QA testers)
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

What language does RealmCrafter require? I have seen so many game engines requiring C# or C++, so I think I’m going to get into that language. Does anyone have a link to C# book tutorials?

Read full topic
item.source: Looking for a team (Modelers, music/sound artists, texture artists & QA testers)

item.title: Looking for a team (Modelers, music/sound artists, texture artists & QA testers)
item.dc:creator: @abtekk abtekk
item.description:
@abtekk wrote:

thrystascape:

What 3D modeling program can export to the format for this engine? What file format are the assets in?

Any 3D modelling program that supports: B3D, 3DS, X, JPG, BMP, PNG, TGA, DDS, WAV, OGG. or one that exports to a format that can be converted to said format.

Read full topic
